description:
Animal rights activists are demanding the Sly Old Fox in Birmingham change its name because it is "derogatory", "inaccurate" and "unfair" to foxes.

The post PETA Animal Rights Activists Demand the Historic Sly Old Fox Pub in Birmingham Change Its “Derogatory” Name appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: PETA Animal Rights Activists Demand the Historic Sly Old Fox Pub in Birmingham Change Its “Derogatory” Name

description:
The ICC's politically charged arrest warrants for Israeli leaders betray its mandate, undermine international justice and embolden terrorists worldwide, says Natasha Hausdorff in the Telegraph.

The post The ICC Has Granted Succour to Terror Organisations Around the World appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The ICC Has Granted Succour to Terror Organisations Around the World

description:
In under a week, a petition calling for a new election has gathered 865,000 signatures, accusing Starmer's Labour of breaking promises and pushing unpopular policies like cutting pensioner subsidies.

The post 865,000 Sign Petition Calling for General Election in Britain As Labour Party Support Fades appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: 865,000 Sign Petition Calling for General Election in Britain As Labour Party Support Fades

description:
Britain's highest-paid prisoners are earning more than some prison officers, with one inmate taking home nearly £37,000 last year – outstripping the salaries of midwives, biochemists and probation officers.

The post Britain’s Best-Paid Inmates Earn More Than Officers Who Guard Them appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Britain’s Best-Paid Inmates Earn More Than Officers Who Guard Them

description:
Northvolt's ambitious battery dream has gone bust, says Sallust, and with it, Europe's hopes of competing with China in the EV market.

The post Northvolt’s Battery Dream Lost to China appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Northvolt’s Battery Dream Lost to China

description:
Scare stories of rising seas swallowing cities whole are a staple of the alarmist narrative. As usual, the facts get in the way, says Chris Morrison, as scientists find global land area is significantly increasing.

The post ‘Rising Seas’ Alarmism Confounded as Global Land Area Significantly Increases appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: ‘Rising Seas’ Alarmism Confounded as Global Land Area Significantly Increases

description:
It may masquerade as a light-hearted, well-meaning festive promo, but Boots's awful Christmas advert is pushing a Queer Theory agenda of inversion that is threatening to rot the West from within, says Steven Tucker.

The post What That Awful Boots Christmas Advert is Really About appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: What That Awful Boots Christmas Advert is Really About

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
